item.title: Remote access with Tailscale
item.description: Right now, I’m writing this blog post sitting in a coffee shop, securely routing all my traffic through a device on my home network and have access to all my Homelab services and devices as if I was at home too. How? Tailscale! ❤️ What is Tailscale? Tailscale is a secure and private, identity-based, infrastructure agnostic network with a flexible topology, resilient networking, and a streamlined setup. — Tailscale Inc1
